overview: SYNOPSIS: On behalf of M-G-M writer - producer - director and narrator James A FitzPatrick trotted all over the earthly sphere, training his Technicolor camera at sights picturesque and poignant for more than twenty years. His simple, straightforward looks at what was best and most interesting in a location allowed a generation of moviegoers to experience the world from their hometown moviehouses
title: FitzPatrick's Traveltalks - Volume 1
